revised_title: The Kinetic Theory of a Gas with Spherically Symmetrical Molecules
tldr: This article presents a study on the kinetic theory of a gas composed of spherically symmetrical molecules. The author applies advanced mathematical methods to the elastic-sphere theory, deriving expressions for viscosity, diffusivity, and conductivity without assuming any specific properties of the molecules other than their symmetry. The findings contribute to a better understanding of gaseous phenomena and the behavior of molecules in a gas.
